resources.string: We have just sent a verification code to your phone number. Please check and enter the code sent to:
You have sent the code too quickly, please wait a few minutes.
You have sent the code more than 3 times, please try again after 24 hours
Your account has been locked because the number of attempts to send a code exceeds the specified number of times
Failed to send code, please try again later
You have not received a confirmation code yet?
To ensure do not miss the event. Please enable auto sart permission for hahalolo application
This message may have been deleted.
